verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of the Preacher <S%H6953><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.
Vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities <S%H1892><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the Preacher <S%H6953><s%>, vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities <S%H1892><s%>; all is vanity <S%H1892><s%>.
What profit <S%H3504><s%> hath a man <S%H120><s%> of all his labour <S%H5999><s%> which he taketh <S%H5998><s%> <S%H8799><s%> under the sun <S%H8121><s%> ?

One generation <S%H1755><s%> passeht away <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and another generation <S%H1755><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: but the earth <S%H776><s%> abideth <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

The sun <S%H8121><s%> also ariseht <S%H2224><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the sun <S%H8121><s%> goeth down <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and hasteth <S%H7602><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to his place <S%H4725><s%> where he arose <S%H2224><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

The wind <S%H7307><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> toward the south <S%H1864><s%>, and turneth about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the north <S%H6828><s%>; it whirleth about continually <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and the wind <S%H7307><s%> returneth again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> according to his circuits <S%H5439><s%>.

All the rivers <S%H5158><s%> run <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into the sea <S%H3220><s%>; yet the sea <S%H3220><s%> is not full <S%H4392><s%>; unto the place <S%H4725><s%> from whence the rivers <S%H5158><s%> come <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, thither they return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8802><s%> again <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

All things <S%H1697><s%> are full of labour <S%H3023><s%>; man <S%H376><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> utter <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> it: the eye <S%H5869><s%> is not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with seeing <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, nor the ear <S%H241><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with hearing <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

The thing that hath been, it is that which shall be; and that which is done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> is that which shall be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: and there is no new <S%H2319><s%> thing under the sun <S%H8121><s%>.

Is there <S%H3426><s%> any thing <S%H1697><s%> whereof it may be said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, this is new <S%H2319><s%>? it hath been already <S%H3528><s%> of old time <S%H5769><s%>, which was before <S%H6440><s%> us.

There is no remembrance <S%H2146><s%> of former <S%H7223><s%> things; neither shall there be any remembrance <S%H2146><s%> of things that are to come <S%H314><s%> with those that shall come after <S%H314><s%>.
I the Preacher <S%H6953><s%> was king <S%H4428><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and search out <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> concerning all things that are done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> under heaven <S%H8064><s%>: this sore <S%H7451><s%> travail <S%H6045><s%> hath 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> to be exercised <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8800><s%> therewith.

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the works <S%H4639><s%> that are done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> under the sun <S%H8121><s%>; and, behold, all is vanity <S%H1892><s%> and vexation <S%H7469><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>.

That which is crooked <S%H5791><s%> <S%H8794><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> be made straight <S%H8626><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: and that which is wanting <S%H2642><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> be numbered <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8736><s%>.

I communed <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with mine own heart <S%H3820><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Lo, I am come to great estate <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and have gotten <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8689><s%> more wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than all they that have been before <S%H6440><s%> me in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: yea, my heart <S%H3820><s%> had great <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%> experience <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> madness <S%H1947><s%> and folly <S%H5531><s%>: I perceived <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that this <S%H1571><s%> also is vexation <S%H7475><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>.

For in much <S%H7230><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is much <S%H7230><s%> grief <S%H3708><s%>: and he that increaseht <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> increaseht <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sorrow <S%H4341><s%>.
